channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Startup Says It Can Clean Your Blood of Microplastics
item.description: The elective medical industry is cashing in on plastic pollution fears, but the evidence of harm from microplastics is still deeply uncertain.

item.title: 15% Off Dell Coupon Codes | April 2025
item.description: Enjoy 15% off with Dell promo code, plus today's deals for up to $400 off laptops, workstations, and all things tech.

item.title: This Is How You Get a Chinese EV Into the United States

item.title: In Search of the Last Wild Axolotls

item.title: ‘Adolescence’ Creator ‘Went Very, Very Deep’ in the Manosphere. Its Appeal Scared Him

item.title: Researchers suggest OpenAI trained AI models on paywalled O’Reilly books
item.description: OpenAI has been accused by many parties of training its AI on copyrighted content sans permission. Now a new paper by an AI watchdog organization make...

item.title: Who are climate-conscious consumers? Not who you’d expect, says Northwind Climate
item.description: Rather than divide people into demographic buckets, Northwind Climate analyzes survey responses for behavioral clues.
